name: Why? (Dylan)
description:
Made this game quickly more as a joke to play with some people. And I wanted to learn more about non-nav mesh-based ai. And Physics-based movement/animations.

The UI for the game was a bit rushed so it could have been much better. 

Controls can be found in the escape menu on the left side. 

How to play with twitch:

First, you need to connect your stream when you're live on twitch. That can be done by pressing the purple button, in the top right of the main menu page. 

On that page, you need to fill in your channel name - username - and oath password which you get by pressing the "get your Oath link" button. 

Viewers can then join with the command: !join  
Currently, a maximum of 50 viewers can be in the match. When an AI dies a new one can join in again. But this can be disabled by pressing the return/enter button. 

If a viewer joins in multiple times the ai from them won't attack each other. So they can form teams. 

Maybe future update:

Random abilities like fire breathing. 
Game options for the match. 
Random air drops?
Feature to instant heal selected AI.
